main.title: Atlas 300 AI Accelerator Card
main.text:
Based on the Ascend 310 AI processor, the Atlas 300 AI accelerator card is packaged in a standard half-height, half-length PCIe card form factor. It supports multiple types of data precision and is suitable for AI training and inference scenarios (mainly inference). The Atlas 300 AI accelerator card uses a groundbreaking Da Vinci architecture to unlock industry-leading performance and energy efficiency. It can be widely used for data centers and the intelligent edge.
Superior Compute Power
Delivers up to 64 TOPS INT8 and 64-channel HD video real-time analytics per card, providing strong computing capability for deep learning and inference.
Hardware Encoding/Decoding
Supports JPEG and video hardware encoding/decoding, boosting image and video applications.
Low Latency
Offers large memory capacity and high bandwidth, meeting memory requirements in feature-matching scenarios and reducing application latency.
bottomTip1: Move the mouse to rotate the model
bottomTip2: Move the mouse to move the model
bottomTip3: Move the mouse to zoom in or out the model
info: • 64TOPS INT8 @ 75W</br>• 64-channel HD video real-time analysis with JPEG decoding supported</br> 32 GB memory | 204.8 Gb/s memory bandwidth</br>• Half-height half-length PCIe 3.0 x16 card
